title: (4302) Architect Designed 2 Storied New Luxury House For Sale. Piliyandala
details: Piliyandala Kotagedara, Architect Designed 2 Storied New Luxury House for Sale. 3100 sq ft, 4 Bedrooms, 3 Pantry (A/C) With Attached Toilets fitted With Quality fitting fully furnished Solar Hot Water, With Double Garage With Remote Door and all Other Modern amenities. 1km to the Piliyandala Town, in a Private Compound. 195 Million (Negotiable) 19.5 Million
